about_the_game:
Tukoni: Forest Keepers is a cute & cozy puzzle adventure, based on a series of award-winning books by the Ukrainian artist Oksana Bula. Play as the forest spirit Tukoni as you meet unique characters, solve captivating puzzles, brew fragrant tea and explore a magical world filled with kindness.



Breathtaking storybook aesthetic
Immerse yourself in a magical hand-drawn forest world, inspired by the kind and nature-loving spirit of the world of Tukoni.

Quest to help Autumn
Autumn is a busy time in the forest, as animals wrap up their matters before taking a winter nap, and forest keepers Tukoni hustle to prepare pillows and blankets of various shapes and forms. As for the main character, he’s a Tukoni on a special mission.

Cast of whimsical characters
Meet a cast of whimsical characters, each with their own unique quirks and endearing traits.

Engaging puzzles & mini-games
Solve puzzles and get ready to be challenged to some captivating mini-games!

The Notebook is your guide
Your Notebook will offer guidance, help you solve puzzles, and document your adventures along the way.



Make fragrant tea
As the seasons change and the forest embraces the chill of autumn, take solace in the comforting ritual of brewing fragrant tea for your newfound friends.

Wholesome adventure for all ages
With its charming visuals and engaging gameplay, Tukoni: Forest Keepers is a family-friendly experience that both parents and children can enjoy together.

Cozy up with Tukoni
Whether it's a lazy afternoon or a chilly evening, Tukoni: Forest Keepers offers a cozy escape into a world of warmth and wonder, perfect for unwinding and embracing the simple joys of life.
detailed_description:
Play our free prologue now!

name: Tukoni: Forest Keepers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 11.0 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 11.0 compatible video card

short_description: Tukoni: Forest Keepers is a cute & cozy puzzle adventure. Play as the forest spirit Tukoni as you meet unique characters, solve captivating puzzles, brew fragrant tea and explore a magical world filled with kindness.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
